Description: Hollow-cast copper alloy animal coffin in the form of a falcon wearing the double crown; incised plumage; square hole in the underside of the tail; tang below the flat base.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Joseph John Acworth
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1986 Jun-Oct, Carmarthen Museum, A son of Luxor's Sands 1992 Jul-Oct, Norfolk, Swaffham Museum, Ancient Egypt
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
